title: Bloomberg Markets: Dodgers CEO Says Fans Deserve to See Games
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Dodgers CEO Says Fans Deserve to See Games
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Stan Kasten\u0010President/CEO\u0010Los Angeles Dodgers \u0010Discussing the ongoing fee dispute between Time Warner Cable Inc. and its competitors that has left Los Angeles Dodgers baseball games blacked out for most fans for several years.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
